description: Works to trees in rear garden subject to LBI TPO (No.167) 1997 - 4 Limes (T1, T2, T5, T7) : Crown lift 4m, crown thin 25% and deadwood.  2 Chestnuts (T6, T8) : Crown lift 4m, crown thin 25% and deadwood.  2 Sycamores (T3, T4) : Crown lift 4m, crown thin 25% and deadwood.  Mountain Ash (T9) : Crown thin 30%.  Maple (T10) : Crown thin 30%.  Plane (T16) : Crown lift 5m, crown thin 30% and deadwood.  Cherry (T13) : Crown lift 3m and crown thin 25%.  Catalpa (T14) : Crown lift 3m and crown thin 25%.  Sycamore (T15) : Crown lift 3m and crown thin 25%
site_name: St Joan Of Arc Primary School
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
